title: Hides, Wholesale Price for Frankfurt, Germany
notes: Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)-- Original Data, 1890-1917, 1919, 1924-1934 (2)--Original Data, 1921-1923. The 1921-1923 Data Have Not Been Converted To Gold Marks As In Other Series In Order To Show The Effects Of Inflation (NBER Note). Data Are Converted From Marks Per Pound To Marks Per 100 Kilograms By Multiplying By 200. No Data Are Given For Hides At Munich. This Series Is Taken From Young Cows, Salted, At Frankfort. See Statistisches Jahrbuch, 1922, P.283 And Following Issues. Source: Statistiches Jahrbuch Fur Das Deutsche Reich, 1921/1922, P.283, And Following Two Issues.
